featured.text: According to Frances Darwin, founder of Henna Heals, the number of artists now involved in the project across Canada and the US has grown to over 150.
Recalling the group’s first tour in Europe, Camake Valaule, a physical education teacher and the founder of the Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers, admitted that he felt very nervous.
Dr. Hare, one of the venture’s co-founders, says a dog’s intelligence can’t be described with a single number.

definition.en_def: A person who establishes an institution, organization, or business.
definition.example: She is the founder of a successful tech startup.
